apparat.math.FastMath

type
class
available in
cpp, cs, java, js, neko, php, swf
The FastMath class defines fast functions to work with Floats. FastMath functions are inlined by Apparat. Trigonometric functions are only approximations. However all approximations should have an error less than 0.008.

Static Variables

DEGREE_RAD(inline,null) : Float

DOUBLE_PI(inline,null) : Float

HALVE_PI(inline,null) : Float

INV_SQRT(inline,null) : Float

platforms
cpp, cs, java, js, php, swf

RAD_DEGREE(inline,null) : Float

Static Methods

inline abs(value : Float) : Float

parameters
value The float whose absolute value is returned.
returns
The absolute value of the specified parameter.
Computes and returns an absolute value.

inline atan2(y : Float, x : Float) : Float

parameters
y A float specifying the y coordinate of the poInt.
x A float specifying the x coordinate of the poInt.
returns
A float.
Computes and returns the angle of the poInt y/x in radians, when measured counterclockwise from a circles x axis (where 0,0 represents the center of the circle). The return value is between positive pi and negative pi.

inline cos(angleRadians : Float) : Float

parameters
angleRadians A float that represents an angle measured in radians.
returns
A float from -1.0 to 1.0.
Computes and returns the cosine of the specified angle in radians. To calculate a radian, see the overview of the Math class. This method is only a fast cosine approximation.

inline isNaN(n : Float) : Bool

parameters
value A float.
returns
true if value is not a Float.
Test if a Float is not a Float.

inline max(value0 : Float, value1 : Float) : Float

parameters
value0 A float.
value1 A float.
returns
The largest of the parameters value0 and value1.
Returns the largest value of the given parameters.

inline min(value0 : Float, value1 : Float) : Float

parameters
value0 A float.
value1 A float.
returns
The smallest of the parameters value0 and value1.
Returns the smallest value of the given parameters.

inline rInt(value : Float) : Int

parameters
value A float.
returns
The float casted to an Integer with respect to its sign.
Integer cast with respect to its sign.

inline rsqrt(value : Float) : Float

parameters
value A float or expression greater than or equal to 0.
returns
If the parameter val is greater than or equal to zero, a float; otherwise NaN (not a float).
throws
TypeError If no ApplicationDomain.domainMemory has been set.
see
initMemory
platforms
swf
Computes and returns the reciprocal of the square root for the specified float.

Note:Calling this function will overwrite the first four bytes of the ApplicationDomain.domainMemory ByteArray. It is required that such a ByteArray exists.

inline rsqrt2(value : Float, address : Int) : Float

parameters
value A float or expression greater than or equal to 0.
address The address in the Alchemy memory buffer.
returns
If the parameter val is greater than or equal to zero, a float; otherwise NaN (not a float).
throws
TypeError If no ApplicationDomain.domainMemory has been set.
see
initMemory
platforms
swf
Computes and returns the reciprocal of the square root for the specified float. The address parameter should be a poInter to a char4 in the Alchemy memory buffer.

inline sign(value : Float) : Float

parameters
value The float whose sign value is returned.
returns
The -1.0 if value<0.0 or 1.0 if value >=0.0 .
Computes and returns the sign of the value.

inline sin(angleRadians : Float) : Float

parameters
angleRadians A float that represents an angle measured in radians.
returns
A float from -1.0 to 1.0.
Computes and returns the sine of the specified angle in radians. To calculate a radian, see the overview of the Math class. This method is only a fast sine approximation.

inline sqrt(value : Float) : Float

parameters
value A float or expression greater than or equal to 0.
returns
If the parameter val is greater than or equal to zero, a float; otherwise NaN (not a float).
throws
TypeError If no ApplicationDomain.domainMemory has been set.
see
initMemory
Computes and returns the square root of the specified float.

Note:Calling this function will overwrite the first four bytes of the ApplicationDomain.domainMemory ByteArray. It is required that such a ByteArray exists.

inline sqrt2(value : Float, address : Int) : Float

parameters
value A float or expression greater than or equal to 0.
address The address in the Alchemy memory buffer.
returns
If the parameter val is greater than or equal to zero, a float; otherwise NaN (not a float).
throws
TypeError If no ApplicationDomain.domainMemory has been set.
platforms
swf
Computes and returns the square root of the specified float. The address parameter should be a poInter to a char4 in the Alchemy memory buffer.
